RoadmapSection.title: Roadmap
RoadmapSection.subtitle: This roadmap outlines our goals and where we want to take Zeroboost Protocol.

roadmaps.title: Planning & Pre-Listing
roadmaps.description: Laying the foundation with research, partnerships, and platform design while building community interest before the launch.

roadmaps.title: Close & Open Testing
roadmaps.description: Refining the platform through rigorous testing phases to ensure stability, usability, and scalability for a seamless user experience.

roadmaps.title: Production and Whitelist Launch
roadmaps.description: Launching the platform to the public with exclusive benefits for early adopters, enabling full access to trading and staking features.

roadmaps.title: Future developments
roadmaps.description: Continuously evolving the platform with new features, enhanced tools, and expanded asset support to stay ahead in the market and meet user needs.

features.title: Trade Futures Without Selling
features.description: Keep ownership of your memes and use them to trade futures.

features.title: Stake in Strategy Vaults
features.description: A range of passive strategy vaults outperform in upward, downward and ranging markets.

features.title: Begin trading now
features.description: with no trade minimums and low fees.

faqs.title: What is Zeroboost?
faqs.description: Zeroboost is an innovative trading platform that allows users to speculate on the rise and fall of major cryptocurrencies and meme tokens. The platform offers advanced features like trading futures without selling your assets, staking in strategy vaults, and beginning trading with no minimums and low fees.

faqs.title: What are Strategy Vaults, and how do they work?
faqs.description: Strategy Vaults are passive investment tools that offer optimized returns in various market conditions,

faqs.title: What kinds of assets can I trade on Zeroboost?
faqs.description: Zeroboost focuses on major cryptocurrencies and meme tokens, giving you a wide range of options to speculate on.

faqs.title: How can I start trading?
faqs.description: With simple onboarding, low entry barriers, and features like strategy vaults, Zeroboost is designed to be user-friendly for beginners while offering advanced tools for seasoned traders.

faqs.title: What's the minimum amount needed to start trading?
faqs.description: Zeroboost has no trade minimums, making it accessible for all users, regardless of their starting capital. Additionally, the platform offers low fees, ensuring that trading remains cost-effective for beginners and experienced traders alike.

faqs.title: How secure is Zeroboost?
faqs.description: Zeroboost prioritizes the safety of your assets and employs state-of-the-art security measures, including robust encryption and secure smart contract protocols.
